metadata.name: Cloud Kingdom
metadata.description:
Artist A-Mashiro
Title Cloud Kingdom
Digital painting
Resolution 5000px x 5000px 350 dpi 
Format PNG

The successful bidder will receive a print of the work (signed) with a blockchain-based certificate of authenticity.

Giclee printing  Canson Aquarelle Rag  WEIGHT (GSM) 310

-To avoid confusion, please link your account to Twitter
-You must be able to contact me after winning a bid
-Please tell me where to send it  (Only countries that can send from Japan)
-Please tell me what size you would like  (max. 31.5" x 31.5" / 800mm x 800mm)
-Blockchain ownership transfer requires an email address and registration for the service(Free)
-The work will be sent to you in a tube. It will not be framed.
-If it can only be sent by sea, it may take several months to arrive.
-I will not be responsible for damage or loss in transit.
-Customs duties may apply depending on the country, in which case you will have to pay your own expenses.
